github_secrets.name: SSH_PRIVATE_KEY
github_secrets.description: Private SSH key for GitHub Actions to connect to VPS
github_secrets.example:
-----BEGIN OPENSSH PRIVATE KEY-----
b3BlbnNzaC1rZXktdjEAAAAABG5vbmUAAAAEbm9uZQAAAAAAAAABAAAAMwAAAAtzc2gtZW
...(your actual private key here)...
-----END OPENSSH PRIVATE KEY-----
github_secrets.notes: Copy the ENTIRE key including BEGIN and END lines. Never commit this key to Git!

github_secrets.name: SSH_KNOWN_HOSTS
github_secrets.description: VPS SSH fingerprint for host verification
github_secrets.notes: Replace YOUR_VPS_IP_HERE with your actual VPS IP address before running the command

github_secrets.name: VPS_HOST
github_secrets.description: VPS IP address or domain name
github_secrets.how_to_get: Use your VPS provider dashboard or check your DNS records
github_secrets.notes: Can be IP address or domain name. Must be accessible from GitHub Actions runners.

github_secrets.name: VPS_USER
github_secrets.how_to_get: The Linux user you created for deployments
github_secrets.notes: Recommended: Create a dedicated 'deploy' user with limited privileges. Avoid using 'root' in production.

github_secrets.name: DEPLOY_PATH
github_secrets.description: Absolute path where repository is cloned on VPS
github_secrets.how_to_get: Choose a stable location on your VPS
github_secrets.notes: This directory will contain the cloned Git repository. Ensure the VPS_USER has read/write permissions.

github_secrets.name: STAGING_URL
github_secrets.description: Full URL where the application will be accessible (for health checks)
github_secrets.notes: Use http:// initially. Change to https:// after SSL is configured. GitHub Actions uses this to verify deployment.

setup_instructions.step_1: Generate SSH key pair on your local machine
setup_instructions.step_2: Add the PUBLIC key to VPS ~/.ssh/authorized_keys
setup_instructions.step_3: Get all 6 values using the 'how_to_get' commands above
setup_instructions.step_5: Click 'New repository secret' and add each secret one by one
setup_instructions.step_6: Test by pushing to develop branch

validation_checklist.public_key_on_vps: ✓ Public key added to VPS authorized_keys
validation_checklist.ssh_connection_works: ✓ Can SSH to VPS using: ssh -i ~/.ssh/github_actions_deploy VPS_USER@VPS_HOST
validation_checklist.all_secrets_added: ✓ All 6 secrets added to GitHub repository
validation_checklist.vps_ready: ✓ VPS has Docker installed and firewall configured
validation_checklist.repo_cloned: ✓ Repository cloned to DEPLOY_PATH on VPS

quick_reference.trigger: Push to 'develop' branch to trigger automated deployment
